text: Poul Holmskov Schlüter (, 3 April 1929 - 27 May 2021) was a Danish politician. He served as Prime Minister of Denmark from 1982 to 1993.Poul Schlüter Den Store Danske, Gyldendals åbne encyclopædi He was also a member of the European Parliament from 1994 until 1999. Schlüter died on 27 May 2021 in Copenhagen, aged 92.Poul Schlüter er død ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Denmark Category:MEPs for Denmark
title: Poul Schlüter
